articles.content: Jude Bellingham and Declan Rice have been targeted by Chelsea in a £200million double summer swoop, according to reports, but owner Todd Boehly faces a battle to secure the services of England's cent… [+3293 chars]

articles.title: How deliberate Aston interference helped Alfa Romeo's $11m bid - The Race
articles.description: Alfa Romeo had little hope of scoring points in the Abu Dhabi GP. Instead, it went for spoiler tactics to hinder the Aston Martin F1 drivers.
articles.content: Alfa Romeo may have only hung onto sixth in the Formula 1 constructors championship by the skin of its teeth after Aston Martin finished level on points, but the teams novel strategic approach, focus… [+7651 chars]

articles.title: Everton finish Australia Tour on a high note - Toffeeweb
articles.description: Tom Cannon scored his first goal for the first-team and Anthony Gordon bagged an impressive hat-trick as Everton won the second of their two games in Australia today.
articles.content:
